name: Bell Mobility Investments
overview: Bell Mobility Investments Inc. is out of business. It was a venture capital arm of the Bell Mobility, Inc. specializing in early stage investments. It used to invest in firms specializing in wireless Internet applications sector with a focus on platforms, applications and services for consumers and enterprises, location based services, gaming and entertainment, and mobile commerce. The firm preferred to invest in Canada. It typically invested between $130,000 and $500,000 in its portfolio companies. Bell Mobility Investments Inc. was founded in 2001 and was based in Dorval, Quebec.
